testcase.name: view of sort option
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ Then Sort by 'RECOMMENDED' should be checked✅ And Sort modal should display all sort options✅ And Close sort modal Icon should be displayed

testcase.name: Verify sort criteria added to query
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ And I select PRICE_LOWEST_FIRST sort by option✅ Then Selected sort by Price should be displayed✅ And Sort criteria PRICE_LOWEST_FIRST added to query url

testcase.name: Verify sort criteria added to query
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ And I select CUSTOMER_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST sort by option✅ Then Selected sort by Customer Rating should be displayed✅ And Sort criteria CUSTOMER_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST added to query url

testcase.name: Verify sort criteria added to query
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ And I select STAR_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST sort by option✅ Then Selected sort by Star Rating should be displayed✅ And Sort criteria STAR_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST added to query url

testcase.name: Verify sort in hotel search results
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ And I select PRICE_LOWEST_FIRST sort by option✅ Then Selected sort by Price should be displayed✅ And Search results are sorted based on the selected Price

testcase.name: Verify sort in hotel search results
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ And I select CUSTOMER_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST sort by option✅ Then Selected sort by Customer Rating should be displayed✅ And Search results are sorted based on the selected Customer Rating

testcase.name: Verify sort in hotel search results
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Hotel search result page is open for destination 'Palm Jumeirah'✅ When I open sort options✅ And I select STAR_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST sort by option✅ Then Selected sort by Star Rating should be displayed✅ And Search results are sorted based on the selected Star Rating
